name: Serialized data element containing non-serialized items
description:
Remove instances where a serializable field, member, etc. is composed of a non-serializable data element.
Notes: 
* in case of technologies with classes and interfaces, this means situations where the serializable field is from a class that is serializable but owns the non-serializable field 
* the serializable nature of an element is technology dependent; for example, serializable capabilities come from sources such as a serializable attribute in .NET and inheritance from the java.io.Serializable interface in Java

qualityRules.name: Quality Rules in numeric ID order
